Translations.Text: Say to them (O Muhammad!): ´Come, let me recite what your Lord has laid down to you
(vi) and do not even draw near to the property of the orphan in his minority except in the best
This is My way -that which is straight: follow it, then, and do not follow other paths lest they scatter you from His path. This is what He has enjoined upon you, so that you may beware.´
